successes.title: Cubii, Under-Desk Elliptical Trainer: Workout While you Work
successes.description: An affordable, sleek, ergonomic trainer that integrates wirelessly with mobile devices and fitness trackers to make sitting healthier

Pledges.description: CUBII SUPPORTER: Support us, and get your name on our prominent wall of fame on our website! Plus weekly insider updates on our progress.
CUBII AMBASSADOR: Support us and get a personalized Cubii tshirt along with exclusive weekly insider updates on our progress. US shipping included. Please add $20 for international shipping.

EARLY BIRD COMPLETE FITNESS PACK: Receive your very own Cubii AND a mobile app to track your exercise that syncs with the state-of-the-art Bluetooth 4.0 inside the device. Shipping not included. Please read FAQ section on shipping. (Retail: $349)

SINGLES FITNESS PACK: Receive your very own Cubii AND a mobile app to track your exercise that syncs with the state-of-the-art Bluetooth 4.0 inside the device. Shipping not included. Please read FAQ section on shipping. (Retail: $349)

COUPLES FITNESS PACK: Receive 2 Cubiis with the mobile app for yourself and your partner to stay active and healthy together! Shipping not included. Please read FAQ section on shipping. (Retail: $698)

OFFICE FITNESS PACK: Receive 8 Cubiis with the mobile app for yourself and your colleagues! Feel energized, healthy, and increase your office or team's productivity! Shipping not included. Please read FAQ section on shipping. (Retail: $2,792. Save almost $600!)

MEET THE FOUNDERS + TRY IT FIRST: Let’s go out for dinner and talk about our development plan. We can meet you in Chicago or almost anywhere else in the US (your choice, but travel costs are not included). You’ll also receive an Office Fitness Pack and the chance to try to product our before anyone else!
